item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. TIL: Some surprising code execution sources in bash (59 points | 27 comments)
2. FreeBSD 14 on a Laptop (12 points | 9 comments)
3. Where’s _why? What Happened When One of the World’s Most Beloved Programmers Vanished (2012) (11 points | 7 comments)
4. They all use it (44 points | 105 comments)
5. Why I stopped using OpenBSD (60 points | 37 comments)
6. BEAM's bright future with Gleam (and JavaScript?) (8 points | no comments)
7. Async/Await Is Real And Can Hurt You (34 points | 77 comments)
8. Native compilation of Prolog predicates with Cranelift (14 points | 3 comments)
9. Compiling Haskell to WebAssembly: A Step-by-Step Guide (7 points | no comments)
10. DBSP: Automatic Incremental View Maintenance for Rich Query Languages (12 points | 5 comments)
11. The stereographic projection of the Stern–Brocot tree (6 points | no comments)
12. AAA - Analytical Anti-Aliasing (53 points | 7 comments)
13. Let’s Encrypt: Ten Years (47 points | 44 comments)
14. The future of bcachefs in the kernel is uncertain (4 points | no comments)
15. Sequin: a tool for inspecting ANSI sequences (21 points | 1 comment)
16. Delta Chat introduces realtime Peer-to-Peer networking (18 points | no comments)
17. GHC's WebAssembly backend now supports Template Haskell and GHCi (6 points | no comments)
18. Rust Foundation Collaborates With AWS Initiative to Verify Rust Standard Libraries (10 points | 3 comments)
19. The Haskell Unfolder Episode 36: concurrency and the FFI (4 points | no comments)
20. Map Keys and Lifetimes (20 points | 1 comment)
21. Does the internet route around damage? - Baltic sea cable cuts (24 points | no comments)
22. N-Spheres (2 points | 1 comment)
23. The Big Data Center Water Problem (2 points | no comments)
24. Finding Bugs in Chrome with CodeQL (2 points | no comments)
25. The Entrust Distrust Will Be More Disruptive Than Intended (1 points | no comments)
